ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:49:09 [Issue ID 4000-27084] urn:comicvine:4000-27084 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:34:47. [Issue ID 41737]
ComicInfo.Summary: Must the Hulk Die?: Bruce continues to weaken and the doctors fear the only way to stabilize him is to merge him with the Hulk once again. The Avengers continue to battle the Hulk and are only able to defeat him as he begins to weaken due to his separation from Banner. Hercules prepares to kill the fallen Hulk but Betty intervenes and pleads for his life.
ComicInfo.Title: Must the Hulk Die?
